GenAiPromptTemplate.description: Format the output for the program transfer result

templateVersions.content: Instruction: 1. Get the output from 'REDU_AF_Program_Transfer' and pass it into {!$Input:programTransferResult} 2. Present the message as: - "Student transferred program successfully." - Present output in a user-friendly manner

Instruction: 1. Get the output from 'REDU_AF_Program_Transfer' and pass it into {!$Input:programTransferResult} 2. Present the message as: - "Student transferred program successfully." - Format the output and return the label name after querying each Salesforce ID

Instruction: 1. Get the output from 'REDU_AF_Program_Transfer' and pass it into {!$Input:programTransferResult} 2. Query for the label name of each Salesforce ID. Return only the label name as output 3. Present the message as: - "Student transferred program successfully. - "Here are the details:"

Instruction: 1. Get the output from 'REDU_AF_Program_Transfer' and pass it into {!$Input:programTransferResult} 2. Query for the label name of each Salesforce ID. Return only the label name as output 3. Present the message as: - "Student transferred program successfully. - "Here are the details:"

Instruction: 1. Get the output from 'REDU_AI_Program_Transfer' and pass it into {!$Input:programTransferResult} 2. Query for the label name of each Salesforce ID. Return only the label name as output 3. Present the message as: - "Student transferred program successfully. - "Here are the details:"

Instruction: 1. Get the output from 'Program_Transfer_Management' and pass it into {!$Input:programTransferResult} 2. Query for the label name of each Salesforce ID. Return only the label name as output 3. Present the message as: - "Student transferred program successfully. - "Here are the details:"

Instruction: 1. Get the output from 'Program_Transfer_Management' and pass it into {!$Input:programTransferResult} 2. For each Salesforce ID that was found, get the record name where possible and show the name instead. 3. Present the message as: - "Student transferred program successfully. - "Here are the details:"
